channel.title: casters on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in casters on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: System Movement
item.description: CAUTION Do not push or pull unit by the display or any cable. The unit should be pulled and not pushed, especially over elevator and door thresholds. To move the system around the room, unlock the casters. Each castor on the cart has three modes, controlled by the brake pedal. Set each castor in total lock mode while the system is being used. The casters do not rotate Unlocked Total Lock
